articles.title: Canon C300 Mark III Lab Test (Pre-Production): Dynamic Range, Rolling Shutter and Latitude - cinema5D news
articles.description: The brand new Canon C300 Mark III put through the paces in our cinema5D lab test. Dynamic range, rolling shutter & underexposure were tested.
articles.content: Shortly after the publication of our Canon C500 Mark II lab test last week, we learned that we will gain early access to a pre-production Canon C300 Mark III in our headquarters in Vienna. And of course we had to take an immediate lab test look at Canons late… [+8066 chars]

articles.title: Gmail users warned to be on alert for 'dangerous' coronavirus content - MyLondon
articles.description: Googlehas revealed that more than 18 million phishing and malware emails related to Covid-19 have been discovered in the last week
articles.content:
Users of Gmail have been alerted about scam emails that use the coronavirus pandemic to trick victims into handing over sensitive details.

articles.title: Finally The Travis Scott Event Is Here In Fortnite - Essentially Sports
articles.description: The Travis Scott Event is finally here in Fortnite after a long wait. It will be a live concert held at Swety Sands with other exciting features.
articles.content: Epic Games have added a lot of new content in Fortnite Season 2 up till now. We had the Deadpool and X Force gear, and we also had a few map changes. Furthermore, we had the Houseparty app trivia, which really made us jog our memory extensively on Fornite kno… [+1852 chars]

articles.title: Animal Crossing is emerging as a media channel for brands in lockdown - The Drum
articles.description: Like Houseparty, Zoom and Instagramming sourdough, Nintendo’s video game Animal Crossing has become a digital icon of the coronavirus era. But as millions of players continue to descend on the fantasy platform, brands have started to find a way in too. Here’s…
articles.content: Just three days after its debut, Animal Crossing: New Horizons catapulted past titles such as Call of Duty: Modern Warfare and Fifa 20 to claim the top spot on the official UK games chart. The sequel to Wild World, City Folk and New Leaf, New Horizons sold mo… [+8217 chars]
